imdb.plot outline: In this series, we met five friends traveling together, and fight with problems making by Giant fish and win their own problems. The series location is a small village into the sea calling Fish Hill. The story is based on the five main characters and what's going to happen in each episode. They maintain their friendships at any situation and come together to resolve their problems. Any of them may do some mistakes but can finally remove it.
imdb.title: Mahi Badkonaki (Puffer Fish)
plot: In this series, we met five friends traveling together, and fight with problems making by Giant fish and win their own problems. The series location is a small village into the sea calling Fish Hill. The story is based on the five main characters and what's going to happen in each episode. They maintain their friendships at any situation and come together to resolve their problems. Any of them may do some mistakes but can finally remove it.::Ramin Karami
